summary: Completed testing of 4 reported bug fixes. All backend APIs working correctly (13/13 tests passed). Frontend verified - GM settings dialog works, Reports tab in catalog shows data correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 reported bugs have been fixed and verified: 1) Settings API now works for general_manager 2) Reports API returns summary with total_estimated/total_actual 3) GM all-orders and pending-orders return items with each order 4) Frontend Reports tab in catalog works correctly

bug_1_item_price_in_catalog.description: Purchase orders have items with unit_price field

bug_2_reports_button_empty_page.description: Reports tab in catalog shows cost savings report with summary data

bug_3_gm_settings_not_working.description: General Manager can access and update settings

bug_4_gm_export_no_data.description: GM all-orders and pending-orders return items with each order

reports_api.cost_savings_has_summary: PASS - Returns summary with total_estimated, total_actual
reports_api.cost_savings_as_gm: PASS - GM can access cost savings

gm_orders_api.pending_orders_returns_items: PASS - Pending orders include items array
